statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-3 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x + 5 , 2 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x + 2 , -2 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x - 14 , -3 \, x^{3} - 9 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x - 21 , -x^{3} - x^{2} + 3 \, x - 5\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
